dt-example.title: DataTables API
dt-example.info: This example shows a possible use of the API methods that were introduced in version 4.0.0. They are: * `-api fixedColumns().left()` - Getter/Setter for the number of left FixedColumns * `-api fixedColumns().right()` - Getter/Setter for the number of right FixedColumns In this example there are 4 buttons to inrease/decrease the number of left/right columns. They do this by getting the current number of fixed columns, then making another call to increase or decrease that value. See the code below the table.
